I was lucky enough to get to attend the opening party of Makamaka... and they threw a hell of a beach party.  The fries!  I loved the fries!  served with a tangy cross between a bbq sauce and a cocktail sauce - just the right amount of salt... i was almost stalking the servers with the trays of fries.  I would go there just for the fries.But that's not all we sampled... for the party, they had these little burger sliders and i was told they had chicken sliders as well.  Deeee-lish!  The staff was friendly, the place was casual, the outdoor area is nicely decorated... I'll definitely return and write an update.  How did we get the invite? some friends had been coming here every day for a week prior to the party - they loved it that much - so they got the invite...  they were already hooked.
